author: vmassol
msg: - Added support for arbitrary file types for <link>, <jump>, etc tags. We are now able to use
- Modified DTD for <resource> in sitemap. Attribute has been changed from "source" to "target" as it now represents the location of the generated file

- Updated the checksitemap task in accordance and modified build script so that the check for broken links now happens after the doc generation and it is performed on the generated tree (and not on the source tree)

author: vmassol
msg: Fixed web site generation warnings (it was missing "site" ids).

author: vmassol
msg: Added support for resources that should not be checked for existence.

author: vmassol
msg: Fix Javadoc 1.4.1 issues with sentences ending with a dot.
